name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TwListMemberAdder - X Bulk Add List Members

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click to bulk add X/Twitter users to your list. Import user list as your list members.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mass add multiple members to your X/Twitter list

HOW TO USE
1. Enter your list link, import your target user id from a CSV file.
2. Click the Start button to add all members

# FEATURES

✓ Auto Mass add list members for X/Twitter.
✓ One click to import user ids from csv file.
✓ Add list member by user ids.

NOTICE

1. List limits: Each account can have up to 1,000 lists, and each list can have up to 5,000 members.
2. Adding accounts: Twitter may limit the number of accounts you can add to a list each day. If you've reached the limit, you may need to wait a day or two before you can add more accounts.
3. Suspicious activity: Twitter may restrict your ability to create or manage lists if it detects unusual activity. This could include adding a large number of accounts to a list in a short period of time.

# FAQ

For more details, visit: https://tw-list-member-adder.extensionsfox.com/#faq
For inquiries, reach out to us at help@extensionsfox.com.

# DATA PRIVACY

All data is processed locally on your computer, never transmitted through our web server, ensuring your privacy. No one else can access your saved data.
